descriptor.name: MP Labour Welfare Scholarship (SKSYC) Application Guide
descriptor.short_desc: Learn how to help children of Madhya Pradesh labourers apply for the Shram Kalyan Shaikshanik Chatravriti Yojana for educational funding.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This module provides a complete guide to the Madhya Pradesh Shram Kalyan Shaikshanik Chatravriti Yojana. Agents will learn how to assist students, whose parents are labourers, in securing scholarships for education from Class 5th up to the post-graduate and professional degree levels like B.E. and M.B.B.S.

  1. Scholarship Levels:
    Understand the wide range of educational stages covered by the scholarship, from middle school (Class 5th) to higher education, including technical courses like ITI, Polytechnic, and professional degrees.
  2. Eligibility Rules:
    Master the specific eligibility criteria, such as the applicant's parents being employed in an institution covered by the Labor Welfare Fund Act, and the limit of two children per family.
  3. Online Application Process:
    Learn the step-by-step procedure for submitting the application on the official MP scholarship portal, including the mandatory Aadhaar authentication for the student and parent.

Why Take This Course:

  • Empower children of labourers to pursue higher education without financial burden.
  • Specialize in a key state-level educational welfare scheme.
  • Become an essential resource in your community for accessing government educational support.

descriptor.name: MP Labour Welfare Board Training Division
descriptor.short_desc: Dedicated to creating awareness and facilitating access to labour welfare schemes in Madhya Pradesh.
descriptor.long_desc: The MP Labour Welfare Board Training Division aims to ensure that the benefits of all welfare schemes, especially educational scholarships, reach the intended recipients by empowering community agents with accurate information.
